text: Þis sind þa landgemæra to Boxoran ærest æt Uuines treowe<../images/tbar.gif>andlang herpaðes to dene pytte þanon up on æscmæres hammas suþeuuearde of þam hammun andlang mearce ut on þone hæðfeld easteuuardne<../images/tbar.gif>ut on lindene norþeuuearde þanon andlang mearce on weocan þorn.
Of þam þorne<../images/tbar.gif>andlang mearce on lamburnan on clatford of clatforda on meos broces heafod<../images/tbar.gif>þanon to allan stapule.
Þanon andlang herpaþes ut on þone mersc<../images/tbar.gif>a be mersce to þam tune on þa hege ræwe<../images/tbar.gif>on þa dic ut on þa burnan þanon ut on þa blacan græfan.
Of þære græfan on rinda crundel of þan crundle to þrim þornan<../images/tbar.gif>andlang weges eft on wines treow þær hit ær on feng.
